tool_description: Get Daily Horoscope Data | Astrology API
name: Horoscope
title: Horoscope

api_list.name: Horoscope By Date
api_list.description: Get horoscope for all horoscope sign for given date

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format, month starts from 01. So for January month use 01, February 02, and so on.

api_list.name: Horoscope For Today
api_list.description: Get today's horoscope for all horoscope signs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://horoscope34.p.rapidapi.com/api/horoscope/today"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horoscope34.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Horoscope Signs
api_list.description: Returns list of all horoscope astrological  signs and their respective images
